list.abs: bootlicker 中文是什么意思中文翻译英英解释安装"查查"工具栏,随时查词典拍马屁者佞人例句与用法 1. That guy is a real bootlicker那个家伙真是个马屁精。.
她很喜欢出风头 She likes to show off 她是个马屁精 She is a bootlicker 他经常说别人坏话 He often speaks ill of others 他爱吹牛 He likes to brag.
I am not your bootlick! 我不会巴结你Strategic point capture占领战略点The trophy is mine! 这战利品是我的!Where is the blood I was promised? 你承诺的.

means.word_mean: 1. attempting to win favor from influential people by flattery
